text: Jean Margraff (17 February 1876 - 11 February 1959) was a French fencer. He won a silver medal in the team sabre event at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1876 births Category:1959 deaths Category:French male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of France Category:Fencers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for France Category:Olympic medalists in fencing Category:Sportspeople from Cher (department) Category:Medalists at the 1920 Summer Olympics
title: Jean Margraff
